about_the_game:
Wishlist Highreach!

Step into the lost world of Highreach, a once-great continent now fractured and floating under a veil of ancient, dangerous magic that alters the very fabric of reality.

Explore this forgotten realm, where survival meets strategy, engage in combat, crafting, and watch as your camp evolves into a thriving settlement. Along the way, you'll meet companions with unique stories, manage your growing community, and embark on personal quests that shape your journey. Are you ready to build, survive, and uncover the secrets of Highreach?

Traverse the sky!

Build your own airship and traverse between a continent of forgotten floating islands. Expand and upgrade your airship with different tech. Make it your flying mobile base, you can always take with you, together with your friends and with settlers.

Manage Your Settlement

Rescue and support survivors, gradually expand your settlement into a thriving base. Your settlers will help with tasks like crafting, cooking, and gathering, making survival more manageable. Assign tasks to settlers, manage buildings, and expand your camp. You'll need to address your settlers' needs, by building sustainable infrastructure and assigning the right jobs and tasks.

Experience A Narrative-driven Journey

Meet companions with unique backstories who join your camp and drive the narrative forward through personal quests. A survival expert is there to guide you, ensuring you're never lost on your journey.

Explore a Dynamic, Procedurally Generated World

Dive into a visually captivating, procedurally generated world with diverse biomes connected. Build a network of connections with ziplines or portals for easier traversal. Each area offers new, unpredictable challenges and rewards, making every exploration unique with diverse points of interest.

Shared Progression

Progress is shared among your group. Specialize your character with shareable items, allowing you to explore diverse combat styles and stay flexible in your approach. Latecomers can simply equip your items, catch up instantly, and jump right into the action.

Key Features

  • Co-op Play: Up to 5 players can join together, with dynamic difficulty scaling based on the group size.

  • Settlement Building: Construct and manage a customizable base with various structures and quality tiers. Use building blueprint placement to quickly deploy entire pre-designed buildings.

  • Settler Professions: Assign roles like woodcutter, miner, and cook to automate tasks and support the settlement. Customize individual settler tasks within each profession for optimized efficiency.

  • Combat System: Engage in melee, ranged, and magic combat with dodge, block, and various attack options. Use supportive magic to heal and assist your team in battle.

  • Narrative-Driven: Complete main and side quests that reveal settlers' personal stories. Chat with settlers to uncover more about their background and the game world.

  • Randomized Dungeons: Delve into procedurally generated dungeons filled with unique challenges and rewards.

  • Progression Through Exploration: Unlock crafting recipes, building structures, resources, quests, NPCs, and points of interest by exploring the world.

  • Day/Night Cycle: Dynamic cycle affecting visibility, settler activity, and environmental dangers.

  • Dynamic Weather: Adapt to changing weather conditions that impact gameplay and survival needs.

  • Procedural World: Explore a procedurally generated world with diverse biomes, points of interest, and environmental challenges.

  • Resource Gatherers: Collect materials like wood, stone, and ore, with specialized settlers assisting in the process.

  • Crafting: Create tools, weapons, and equipment using gathered resources at crafting stations, with settlers expanding the crafting capabilities.

  • Survival: Manage hunger, thirst, health, stamina, and temperature to stay alive. Consuming food and drinks can provide buffs to health and stamina.

name: Highreach

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 7500k or AMD Ryzen 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 or AMD RX 5700-XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 11700k or AMD Ryzen 3800X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 4070 or AMD RX 7800-XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: Adventurer, discover the secrets of the torn continent of Highreach, face dangerous enemies on your journey and help other travelers who will join and help you! Explore, fight, survive, create! The future of Highreach is in your hands!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
